name: Dodge The Doge
description:
Hi this is a game where the doge goes brrrrr and the duck goes quack.

Game made for the FUN button jam. Yes, I created a game for my own jam, so what?

Credits:

Sfx of game over: https://freesound.org/people/Autistic%20Lucario/sounds/142608/

UPDATE 14/08/20 (or 08/14/20): Added music and animations. Increased the hitbox of the ducks.

UPDATE 15/08/20 (or 08/15/20): Added a combo system with animations. Added an option to turn off the music.
